title: Hiver <> Hip - ClickUp w/ Hiver Permalinks for Access/Visibility for non Hiver users

signals.Ask: We need the ability to automatically create ClickUp tasks from emails to improve workflow efficiency.
signals.Evidence: The problem is whether they use the ClickUp widget or go into ClickUp. It's still a manual process. And so we don't get great adoption of them actually doing that.
